documentation.purpose: Add appropriate orders to transfuse order

statements.statement: execute eks_t_translate_lab_refhelp go /*select s.mnemonic, oc.primary_mnemonic from order_catalog_synonym s, order_catalog oc, code_value c plan c where c.code_set = 6000 and c.active_ind = 1 and c.display_key="LABORATORY" join oc where oc.catalog_type_cd = c.code_value join s where s.catalog_cd = oc.catalog_cd and s.mnemonic>" " order by cnvtupper(S.MNEMONIC) */

execute eks_t_translate_lab_refhelp go /*select s.mnemonic, oc.primary_mnemonic from order_catalog_synonym s, order_catalog oc, code_value c plan c where c.code_set = 6000 and c.active_ind = 1 and c.display_key="LABORATORY" join oc where oc.catalog_type_cd = c.code_value join s where s.catalog_cd = oc.catalog_cd and s.mnemonic>" " order by cnvtupper(S.MNEMONIC) */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_LOC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL that QUAL in DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_ADDON_LABEL
templateDefinitions.definition: add PROCEDURE1 to PROCEDURE2 with no change to the original order parameters, associate CHART order comment COMMENT to the added procedure and print label OPTION.
templateDefinitions.description: Add order to an existing accession with print label option

statements.statement: select ocs.mnemonic,catalog_type=cv.display from order_catalog oc, order_catalog_synonym ocs, code_value cv plan oc where oc.orderable_type_flag not in (2,3,6,8,11) and oc.active_ind = 1 and oc.catalog_type_cd > 0 join cv where cv.code_value = oc.catalog_type_cd and cv.cdf_meaning != "PHARMACY " join ocs where ocs.catalog_cd = oc.catalog_cd and ocs.mnemonic = oc.primary_mnemonic order cnvtupper(ocs.mnemonic)

column.value: No, do not print a label

value.value: Order added by Discern Expert Monitor.
Order added by Discern Expert Monitor.
Order added by Discern Expert Monitor.
Order added by Discern Expert Monitor.
BB ABO + Rh added by Discern Expert Rules System
BB Antibody Screen added by Discern Expert Rules System
